Description: Rectangular cedar coffin of Sepi; painted Hieroglyphic text and eye-panel.
Curator's comments: Davies, in Davies & Schofield, Egypt, the Aegean & the Levant: 147 [24], pl.31 [2]. Harco Willems Chests of Life (1988) [cat no. B5L]. Nicholson and Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000), p. 350
